alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Camp; Cass; Franklin; Harrison; Marion; Morris; Red River; Titus; Upshur (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 13 at 9:38PM CDT until June 14 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 285 REMAINS VALID UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL ARKANSAS UNION IN SOUTHWEST ARKANSAS COLUMBIA HEMPSTEAD HOWARD LAFAYETTE LITTLE RIVER MILLER NEVADA SEVIER IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 PARISHES IN NORTH CENTRAL LOUISIANA CALDWELL JACKSON LINCOLN OUACHITA UNION IN NORTHWEST LOUISIANA BIENVILLE BOSSIER CADDO CLAIBORNE WEBSTER IN OKLAHOMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHEAST OKLAHOMA MCCURTAIN IN TEXAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST TEXAS BOWIE CAMP CASS FRANKLIN HARRISON MARION MORRIS RED RIVER TITUS UPSHUR THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ARCADIA, ASHDOWN, ATLANTA, BERNICE, BIG SANDY, BOGATA, BOSSIER CITY, BRADLEY, BROKEN BOW, CLARKS, CLARKSVILLE, COLUMBIA, DAINGERFIELD, DE QUEEN, DIERKS, EL DORADO, FARMERVILLE, GIBSLAND, GILMER, GRAYSON, HAYNESVILLE, HOMER, HOPE, HUGHES SPRINGS, IDABEL, JEFFERSON, JONESBORO, LEWISVILLE, LINDEN, LONE STAR, MAGNOLIA, MARSHALL, MINDEN, MINERAL SPRINGS, MONROE, MOUNT PLEASANT, MOUNT VERNON, NAPLES, NASHVILLE, OMAHA, PITTSBURG, PRESCOTT, QUEEN CITY, RINGGOLD, RUSTON, SHREVEPORT, SPRINGHILL, STAMPS, TEXARKANA, AND TEXARKANA.
